name: Lebara Switzerland App
description: NOW AVAILABLE: CREDIT CARD TOP UP!  HIGHLIGHTS: > Easy login.  > See your remaining call credit. > Top up your account. > See your usage and top-up history. > Check on active options. > Activate and deactivate options.   MANAGE YOUR SAVINGS OPTIONS: With the Lebara app you can see what savings options you have active, when they will be renewed and how much they cost.  EASY LOGIN: Log in once with your Lebara number and stay logged in. No password to remember.   NOTE: The App is available exclusively to those with a Lebara Mobile Switzerland SIM card.  --------------------------------------  Costs: - using Lebara CH App is free of charge - the Apps data traffic, is billed in accordance with the connection rates of your mobile service provider or your Wi-Fi network. - using the application abroad will result in additional cost due to roaming.  Feedback: If you discover a bug or have suggestions to improve this app, please contact us at app@lebara.ch. For bug reports, please include as much relevant information as possible.  We would greatly appreciate it if you could leave us a five star rating!!
